Acceptance criteria: each CSS module should work independently when imported.

title: Transform boring-ui into reusable framework for internal projects
description:
Convert boring-ui from standalone app into reusable configurable framework for boring-bi, kurt, and other projects. Focus on generic components, config-driven design, parametrizable styles.

Key: Zero hardcoded app logic, all config via app.config.js, brand-agnostic styling, clean exports.

1. **Generic Components**: Core components (Header, FileTree, Terminal, Editor, Chat) fully framework-like. Remove app-specific refs. All config via props/context. Defaults provided.

2. **Configuration System**: Complete schema.js validation. Zod validation. Feature flags. TypeScript types. Config examples per project.

3. **Parametrizable Styling**: Design tokens configurable via app.config.js. Per-project colors/fonts/spacing. StyleProvider context. Light/dark customizable. Defaults included.

4. **Export & Docs**: Complete barrel files. JSDoc. Integration guide. Example configs. Copy-paste-friendly.

5. **Testing**: Unit tests. Config validation. Integration tests. TypeScript where valuable.

Success: boring-bi integrates via Git, customizes via config.js, zero CSS editing, brand-agnostic, documented.

title: Make design tokens parametrizable
description:
Create a style configuration system to allow projects to customize the design tokens:

1. **Style Schema (src/styles/schema.js)**:
   - Zod schema for style configuration
   - Defaults that match current tokens.css
   - Categories: colors, typography, spacing, shadows, transitions

2. **StyleProvider Context (src/styles/StyleProvider.jsx)**:
   - React context that provides computed CSS tokens
   - useStyles() hook for reading style config
   - Injects custom CSS variables into :root and [data-theme="dark"]

3. **Config Integration**:
   - Add `styles` field to app.config.js schema
   - Merge with built-in defaults
   - Examples: custom brand colors, custom fonts, spacing scales

4. **Per-Project Customization**:
   - boring-bi: Custom B color palette
   - kurt: Custom K color palette
   - Projects can override: primary-accent, fonts, spacing, shadows

Acceptance criteria:
- Projects can customize colors without editing CSS
- Typography scales configurable
- Theme colors work in both light/dark modes
- Fallbacks to defaults if config incomplete
- Zero runtime CSS parsing (all static CSS variables)
